code: import{ACCOUNT_STATUS_ANONYMUS,ACCOUNT_STATUS_JUROR_ACTIVE,ACCOUNT_STATUS_JUROR_INACTIVE}from'../types/account-status-types';var HIGH_PROBABILITY_BASE=0.1;export function getAccountStatus(balances,minActiveBalance){var activeBalance=balances.activeBalance;if(activeBalance.amount.gte(minActiveBalance))return ACCOUNT_STATUS_JUROR_ACTIVE;if(!isANJHolder(balances))return ACCOUNT_STATUS_ANONYMUS;return ACCOUNT_STATUS_JUROR_INACTIVE;}function isANJHolder(balances){return Object.values(balances).reduce(function(isHolder,balance){return isHolder||balance.amount.gt(0);},false);}export function getProbabilityText(probability){return probability>=HIGH_PROBABILITY_BASE?'High':'Low';}
